Package com.platform.subscription.api

Class TestSubscriptionController

java.lang.Object
com.platform.subscription.api.TestSubscriptionController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/organizations/{orgId}/subscription") @Profile("!prod") public class TestSubscriptionController extends Object
Test-only subscription endpoints to satisfy integration tests. Active in all profiles except production for security.
